A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it twice. Can definitely see why some people would be annoyed at some of the direction of the film. On my second viewing\, I sat next to an older couple that kept asking if it was over yet.  Didn't affect me. I loved this movie. Suggestions for those who haven't seen it yet: Don't go in with any expectations. That's how I approached this one and for the first time ever\, a Star Wars film didn't fall short of what I wanted.
